languages.text: "Забавно. Многие обвиняли меня в слабости, но мне всегда хватало сил, чтобы защитить своих людей от тех, кто видел в них беззащитную отару".
"Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."
languages.original_text: "Забавно. Многие обвиняли меня в слабости, но мне всегда хватало сил, чтобы защитить своих людей от тех, кто видел в них беззащитную отару".

traits.locale_text: "Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."
"Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."
"Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."
"Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."
"Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."
"Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."

languages.text: « Fascinant. On m'a souvent {mf|qualifié|qualifiée} de faible, mais j'ai toujours eu assez de force pour protéger mon peuple contre ceux qui le voyaient comme un troupeau sans défense. »
languages.original_text: "Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."

traits.locale_text: « Fascinant. On m'a souvent {mf|qualifié|qualifiée} de faible, mais j'ai toujours eu assez de force pour protéger mon peuple contre ceux qui le voyaient comme un troupeau sans défense. »

languages.text: «Fascinante. Muchos me han llamado débil, pero siempre he tenido la fuerza necesaria para proteger a mi gente de aquellos que la consideran un rebaño indefenso».
languages.original_text: "Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."

traits.locale_text: «Fascinante. Muchos me han llamado débil, pero siempre he tenido la fuerza necesaria para proteger a mi gente de aquellos que la consideran un rebaño indefenso».

languages.text: “真是有趣。很多人都说我太软弱，但每当我需要保护我的人民时，我的力量总是强大无比。”
languages.original_text: "Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."

traits.locale_text: “真是有趣。很多人都说我太软弱，但每当我需要保护我的人民时，我的力量总是强大无比。”

languages.text: 「魅力的だ。多くの人は私を弱者だと呼んだが、私はいつでも、民を無防備な群れと見なす人々から、彼らを守れるだけの力は持ち合わせてきた」
languages.original_text: "Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."

traits.locale_text: 「魅力的だ。多くの人は私を弱者だと呼んだが、私はいつでも、民を無防備な群れと見なす人々から、彼らを守れるだけの力は持ち合わせてきた」

languages.text: "Faszinierend. Mich haben schon viele schwach genannt, doch ich hatte immer genug Kraft, um meine Leute vor jenen zu beschützen, die in ihnen nur wehrlose Schäfchen gesehen haben."
languages.original_text: "Fascinating. Many have called me weak, but I have always had enough strength to protect my people from those who saw them as a defenceless flock."

traits.locale_text: "Faszinierend. Mich haben schon viele schwach genannt, doch ich hatte immer genug Kraft, um meine Leute vor jenen zu beschützen, die in ihnen nur wehrlose Schäfchen gesehen haben."
